actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide for confidentiality in the granting and voting of proxies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide for: (1) proxy voting confidentiality; and (2) inclusion of certain proxy information provided to shareholders, including proposals regarding corporate officer and board compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide for confidentiality in the granting and voting of proxies, and for other purposes.
